name: Notion Trigger
semantic_context: Starts the workflow when Notion events occur
natural_language_description: 这是 Notion Trigger 节点。主要用于: Starts the workflow when Notion events occur

pollTimes.name: pollTimes
pollTimes.description: Time at which polling should occur
pollTimes.natural_language_description: 参数名: Poll Times | 作用: Time at which polling should occur | 默认值: {'item': [{'mode': 'everyMinute'}]}

event.name: event
event.natural_language_description: 参数名: Event | 默认值: pageAddedToDatabase | (必填项)

notionNotice.displayName: In Notion, make sure to add your connection to the pages you want to access.
notionNotice.name: notionNotice
notionNotice.natural_language_description: 参数名: In Notion, make sure to add your connection to the pages you want to access.

databaseId.name: databaseId
databaseId.description: The Notion Database to operate on
databaseId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Database | 作用: The Notion Database to operate on | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

simple.name: simple
simple.description: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data
simple.natural_language_description: 参数名: Simplify | 作用: Whether to return a simplified version of the response instead of the raw data | 默认值: True
